channel.description: The top News headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit https://www.smh.com.au
channel.title: Sydney Morning Herald - Latest News

item.dc:creator: Ronny Lerner
item.description: The Saturday night double-header sees Essendon face old rivals Carlton at the MCG and the red-hot Gold Coast host winless Fremantle at Metricon Stadium.
item.title: AFL 2020 Live Updates: Essendon Bombers face old rivals Carlton Blues, Gold Coast Suns host Fremantle Dockers

item.description: The news of the day as interpreted by our talented artists, illustrators and cartoonists.
item.title: Best of cartoons, June 28, 2020

item.dc:creator: Phil Lutton
item.description: How the mighty have fallen. Brisbane were booed off at half-time on their way to another limp defeat, with critics lining up to sink the boot into the Red Hill giants.
item.title: 'I'm gobsmacked': Broncos brace for flood of criticism after loss to Titans

item.description: The best photos from the international wire agencies as chosen by our picture editors
item.title: Gallery: The best photos from around the world

item.description: Australian sharpshooter Ryan Broekhoff is joining Ben Simmons and Brett Brown at the Philadelphia 76ers for their run at the NBA championship.
item.title: Aussie sharpshooter Broekhoff joins Philadelphia

item.description: Sam's joy and happy energy belie his bravey through life-changing Australian-first surgery.
item.title: A brave boy and a medical miracle

item.dc:creator: Jewel Topsfield
item.description: The crucial role multicultural media plays in conveying information about COVID-19 to Australians who speak a language other than English at home has been recognised by the government as it scrambles to respond to a second spike in cases in Victoria.
item.title: The crucial role multicultural media has played in combating COVID-19

item.dc:creator: Benjamin Preiss
item.description: Work has begun to rejuvenate the Bendigo Creek by the Dja Dja Wurrung Traditional Owners and Bendigo council.
item.title: The reimagining of Bendigo Creek

item.dc:creator: Caitlin Fitzsimmons
item.description: The ABC's cost-cutting axe has slashed into the ABC ME children's channel including hosts Pip Rasmussen, Ava Madon and Drew Parker.
item.title: ABC ME presenters mourn 'sad' cuts

item.dc:creator: Anthony Colangelo
item.description: St Kilda's win leaves defending premiers Richmond flailing and without a victory since the resumption of the 2020 season.Â
item.title: Fearless Saints upset flailing Richmond

item.description: The two-time defending champion showed no signs of rust, producing a dominant drive in the first of three 33-lap races this weekend.
item.title: Ford motion: McLaughlin leads from the front in Supercars return

item.description: Tennis's flagship team events the Davis Cup and Fed Cup Finals have been postponed until 2021 because of the COVID-19 pandemic, the International Tennis Federation (ITF) said.
item.title: Davis Cup and Fed Cup finals postponed for 12 months

item.dc:creator: Natassia Chrysanthos
item.description: Police were called to the main shopping strip in Auburn just before 5pm following reports that up to 20 men were in a brawl.
item.title: Four teenagers stabbed and in hospital after brawl in Auburn

item.dc:creator: Caitlin Fitzsimmons
item.description: NSW Health said only 2 per cent of returned travellers in quarantine in Sydney hotels had refused to be tested for COVID-19, as the state reported six new cases, including one in Penrith.
item.title: Testing rates for returning travellers in Sydney at 98 per cent

item.description: Lions return to Taronga Zoo.
item.title: Return of the King

item.dc:creator: Christian Nicolussi
item.description: Mitchell Pearce picked the worst afternoon to have a poor game as his one-time Origin nemesis Johnathan Thurston had a front-row seat to the Knights 32-20 loss.
item.title: 'There was a lack of grit': Knights coach dismayed at Cowboys loss

item.dc:creator: The Age's View
item.description: From the blackened wreckage of many regional communities this summer rose one unmalleable truth: the critical and enduring relevance of the ABC to the lives of all Australians.
item.title: ABC must be funded to tell us what we need to know

item.dc:creator: Dominic Bossi
item.description: The over-worked Matildas have had a rare three-month break. But now they desperately need training and games if they're to shine in 2023.
item.title: 'Playing again is our priority': Matildas desperate to regroup after COVID break

item.description: The Grafton Cup prelude headlines a seven-race card in the north of NSW on Sunday.
item.title: Race-by-race tips and preview for Grafton on Sunday

item.description: Grafton has always been a happy hunting ground for the stable and the trainer is every chance of walking away with a double on Sunday.
item.title: Karakatsanis ready to add to happy Grafton memories

item.dc:creator: Paul Sakkal
item.description: Police have released an image of Michael Mammone and his silver BMW in the hope that someone has information about Cranbourne death.
item.title: Man, 47, identified after being found dead in south-eastern suburbs car park

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: The COVID-19 pandemic continues to spread as Australia turns its attention to outbreaks in Victoria.
item.title: Coronavirus updates LIVE: Global cases pass 9 million, Australian death toll stands at 104

item.description: Frankely Awesome has reignited her career for trainer Kris Lees with a WJ McKell Cup victory at Rosehill on Saturday.
item.title: Frankely Awesome back to form in McKell

item.description: Evidence demonstrates clearly that the governmentâs discrediting of the humanities as irrelevant in the job market is nothing more than humbug wrapped up as policy.

item.dc:creator: Damien Ractliffe
item.description: Odds-on favourite Harbour Views failed to live up to expectations at Caulfield on Saturday in a blow to trainer Matthew Williams' Cox Plate ambitions.

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: WA premier Mark McGowan "hates" the idea of bidding against other states to host this year's AFL grand final when he believes Optus Stadium is the best location for the game if the MCG is unable to have crowds due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
item.title: McGowan insists Perth is the best location for grand final

item.dc:creator: Jake Niall
item.description: The COVID crisis has clarified the genuine raison d'etre of the AFL competition, which is to simply have a competition in which players, coaches et al are employed and fans are engaged.
item.title: Unfairly run? How the AFL's compromises are piling up

item.description: Charlie Dixon dominated as Port Adelaide beat West Coast to continue their unbeaten AFL season on Saturday.
item.title: Dixon stands tall as Port Adelaide remain undefeated

item.dc:creator: Zach Hope
item.description: The Royal Botanic Gardens' old white oak, which fell late last year, will live on as a meeting place.

item.description: The peak body for lawyers wants new anti-harassment measures aimed at judges and a federal judicial watchdog in the wake of the Dyson Heydon scandal.
